languages.text: {n}Глаз на рукояти меча распахивается — на вас взирает нечто столь древнее и темное, что вы перестаете дышать. Вы уже чувствовали на себе этот взгляд — тогда, на мостике... и голос, возникший в вашей голове, лишь подтверждает вашу догадку.{/n} "Гобелен соткан. Путь избран. Прими свою участь, чемпион".

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаз на рукояти меча распахивается — на вас взирает нечто столь древнее и темное, что вы перестаете дышать. Вы уже чувствовали на себе этот взгляд — тогда, на мостике... и голос, возникший в вашей голове, лишь подтверждает вашу догадку.{/n} "Гобелен соткан. Путь избран. Прими свою участь".

languages.text: {n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаз на рукояти меча распахивается — на вас взирает нечто столь древнее и темное, что вы перестаете дышать. Вы уже чувствовали на себе этот взгляд — тогда, на мостике... и голос, возникший в вашей голове, лишь подтверждает вашу догадку.{/n} "Гобелен соткан. Путь избран. Прими свою участь, чемпион".

traits.locale_text: {n}The eye on the handle of the sword opens wide, and something gazes at you, so ancient and dark that you stop breathing. You felt this gaze before, that time, at the bridge... and the voice that appeared in your head only supports your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

{n}The eye on the handle of the sword opens wide, and something gazes at you, so ancient and dark that you stop breathing. You felt this gaze before, that time, at the bridge... and the voice that appeared in your head only supports your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

{n}The eye on the sword hilt opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You've felt this gaze before, that time on the bridge... and the voice that chimes in your head only supports your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

{n}The eye on the sword hilt opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You've felt this gaze before, that time on the bridge... and the voice that chimes in your head only supports your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

{n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

languages.text: {n}剑柄上的眼睛猛地睁开，古老而黑暗的目光让你喘不上来气。你以前感受过这样的目光，当时是在舰桥上……随后，你脑海中响起了某个声音，佐证了你的猜测。{/n}“绣帷已经织好，道路已然选定。接受你的命运吧，勇士。”
languages.original_text: {n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}剑柄上的眼睛猛地睁开，古老而黑暗的目光让你喘不上来气。你以前感受过这样的目光，当时是在舰桥上……随后，你脑海中响起了某个声音，佐证了你的猜测。{/n}“绣帷已经织好，道路已然选定。接受你的命运吧，勇士。”

languages.text: {n}L'œil s'ouvre et un regard d'une noirceur absolue, venue des temps anciens, vous transperce et vous coupe le souffle. Vous avez déjà senti ce regard sur vous sur la passerelle... et la voix que vous entendez dans votre tête achève de vous convaincre.{/n} « La tapisserie est tissée. La voie est choisie. Acceptez votre destin, {mf|champion|championne}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'œil s'ouvre et un regard d'une noirceur absolue, venue des temps anciens, vous transperce et vous coupe le souffle. Vous avez déjà senti ce regard sur vous sur la passerelle... et la voix que vous entendez dans votre tête achève de vous convaincre.{/n} « La tapisserie est tissée. La voie est choisie. Acceptez votre destin, {mf|champion|championne}. »

languages.text: {n}剣の柄の瞳が大きく見開く。そのあまりにも古く、暗黒なる視線にあなたは息を呑んだ。この視線を感じたことがあった。あそこで、ブリッジで…頭の中で響く声がその推測を裏付ける。{/n}「タペストリーは織り上げられた。道は選ばれた。英雄よ、運命を受け容れよ」
languages.original_text: {n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}剣の柄の瞳が大きく見開く。そのあまりにも古く、暗黒なる視線にあなたは息を呑んだ。この視線を感じたことがあった。あそこで、ブリッジで…頭の中で響く声がその推測を裏付ける。{/n}「タペストリーは織り上げられた。道は選ばれた。英雄よ、運命を受け容れよ」

languages.text: {n}El ojo se abre, revelando una mirada tan antigua y oscura que te arrebata el aliento. Has sentido esta mirada antes, en el puente... y la voz que resuena en tu mente confirma tus sospechas.{/n} «El tapiz está tejido. El camino, elegido. Acepta tu destino, campe{mf|ón|ona}».
languages.original_text: {n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}El ojo se abre, revelando una mirada tan antigua y oscura que te arrebata el aliento. Has sentido esta mirada antes, en el puente... y la voz que resuena en tu mente confirma tus sospechas.{/n} «El tapiz está tejido. El camino, elegido. Acepta tu destino, campe{mf|ón|ona}».

languages.text: {n}Das Auge öffnet sich weit. Sein Blick ist so uralt und dunkel, dass dir der Atem stockt. Du hast diesen Blick schon einmal gespürt ... dort, auf der Brücke ... und die Stimme, die in deinem Verstand ertönt, bestätigt deine Vermutung.{/n} "Der Teppich ist gewoben. Der Pfad ist gewählt. Akzeptiert Euer Schicksal, Champion."
languages.original_text: {n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Auge öffnet sich weit. Sein Blick ist so uralt und dunkel, dass dir der Atem stockt. Du hast diesen Blick schon einmal gespürt ... dort, auf der Brücke ... und die Stimme, die in deinem Verstand ertönt, bestätigt deine Vermutung.{/n} "Der Teppich ist gewoben. Der Pfad ist gewählt. Akzeptiert Euer Schicksal, Champion."

{n}Das Auge auf dem Schwertgriff öffnet sich weit. Sein Blick ist so uralt und dunkel, dass dir der Atem stockt. Du hast diesen Blick schon einmal gespürt, damals auf der Brücke ... und die Stimme, die in deinem Kopf ertönt, stützt deine These nur.{/n} "Der Wandteppich ist gewebt. Der Pfad ist gewählt. Akzeptiert Euer Schicksal, Champion."

languages.text: {n}Göz, ardına kadar açılıyor. Eski ve karanlık bakışı, nefesini kesiyor. Bu bakışı daha önce bir yerde hissetmiştin. Evet, köprüde... Zihninde beliren ses, tahminini doğruluyor.{/n} "Ağın örüldü. Yol belirlendi. Kaderini kabul et müdafi."
languages.original_text: {n}The eye opens wide, revealing a gaze so ancient and dark that it steals your breath away. You have felt this gaze before — there, on the bridge... and the voice that appears in your mind only confirms your guess.{/n} "The tapestry is woven. The path is chosen. Accept your fate, champion."
